columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the Regex Pattern set.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the entity.

columns.name: id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the Regex Pattern set.

columns.name: scope
columns.description: Specifies the scope of the Regex Pattern Set. Possible values are: 'REGIONAL' and 'CLOUDFRONT'.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the Regex Pattern set that helps with identification.

columns.name: lock_token
columns.description: A token used for optimistic locking.

columns.name: regular_expressions
columns.description: The list of regular expression patterns in the set.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the resource.

columns.name: partition
columns.description: The AWS partition in which the resource is located (aws, aws-cn, or aws-us-gov).

columns.name: region
columns.description: The AWS Region in which the resource is located.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: The AWS Account ID in which the resource is located.
